name: Sarah Avraham
description:
Sarah Avraham is just your stereotypical young Jewish woman. Of course, with a name like that!

Like many young women, Sarah has found it hard to make money in her chosen profession. To make ends meet, she cleans houses, walks dogs, and waits tables.

Still, Sarah keeps at it, despite the lack of financial reward. She pushes forward, obstacles or not. And she's gotten quite good at.

Sarah is the World Muay Thai Federation champion in her weight class. That's Thai kickboxing.

Of course, not everything about Sarah is stereotypical. She was born in India and moved to Israel after the Mumbai terrorist attacks. There, she converted to Judaism.

But Sarah knows that kickboxing won't be there forever. When she gets older, she wants to be a doctor, like her father!

See, your stereotypical young Jewish woman...
